Constant police patrol all day and night, very safe her.
Unsure, but I no that they have it.
Theres a lot of clubs and activities.
This university has a lot of areas of majors that can be great for any major.
Most people hang out in the computer labs or the mall are, which is an are you can hear people playing music, talking, eating, and other things.
Even though this is a catholic college it shows equility to other religions. Theres an organization that promotes the rights of the LGTB community.
There are always activities to partake in, concerts, and different organizations to join.
Depending on what is being serve the food is great.
I'm a communter, so I can't give information on dorm life.
The classes in Social Work are very demanding, so keep up with your work and don't take a lot of classes.
Talk to other students to learn what classes are needed and which professors to take.
Our Lady of the Lake is a great university. I like the small setting of the classes. The only thing that I do not like is some of the Professors.

On my first campus tour I was addressed by everyone & given all the attention necessary. I was able to ask questions and get a better understanding of this university and am pleased to be attending this university for the fall of 2012.}
